sentences.en: a campaign to win the hearts and minds of America's college students.
sentences.cn: 争取美国大学生全心支持的运动。

sentences.en: Age diminishes the heart's ability to pump harder and faster under exertion.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增加，人在消耗体力时心脏的输血能力和输血速度会有所减弱。

sentences.en: Bob died of a heart attack, brought on by his lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃死于由他的生活方式引起的心脏病突发。

sentences.en: Can you hear my heart beating?
sentences.cn: 你能听见我的心跳吗？

sentences.en: Daniel had no history of heart problems.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔没有心脏病史。

sentences.en: Did she usurp his place in his mother's heart?
sentences.cn: 她取代了他在他母亲心目中的地位吗？

sentences.en: Frank had been struck down by a massive heart attack.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克的身体已经被一场严重的心脏病拖垮了。

sentences.en: He appealed to his countrymen not to lose heart.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁自己的同胞不要丧失信心。

sentences.en: He remained in a critical condition after suffering heart failure.
sentences.cn: 他发生心力衰竭后病情一直危重。

sentences.en: Her cheeks were hot and her heart was pounding.
sentences.cn: 她脸颊发烫，心怦怦直跳。

sentences.en: His breathing and heart rate were now normal.
sentences.cn: 他的呼吸和心率现在都正常了。

sentences.en: His heart was full of anger and grief.
sentences.cn: 他的内心充满愤怒和悲伤。

sentences.en: I don't have the heart to tell her.
sentences.cn: 我不忍心告诉她。

sentences.en: If someone says something critical I take it to heart.
sentences.cn: 如果有人提出批评，我会十分介意。

sentences.en: My heart raced. Were we going to land safely?
sentences.cn: 我心跳得厉害。我们能安全着陆吗？

sentences.en: My heart was hammering. The footsteps had stopped outside my door.
sentences.cn: 我的心怦怦直跳。脚步声已停在我的门外。

sentences.en: Regular exercise is good for the heart.
sentences.cn: 经常锻炼对心脏有好处。

sentences.en: She suffers from a rare heart condition.
sentences.cn: 她患有罕见的心脏病。

sentences.en: She told him she only had his interests at heart.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他自己万事都是为了他好。

sentences.en: She was fitted with a pacemaker after suffering serious heart trouble.
sentences.cn: 她患上严重的心脏病后安装了心脏起搏器。

sentences.en: Shirley's brother is now a consultant heart surgeon in Sweden.
sentences.cn: 雪利的兄弟现在在瑞典做心脏外科高级顾问医师。

sentences.en: The doctor had an extremely kind heart.
sentences.cn: 那位医生有一颗特别善良的心。

sentences.en: The doctor said James had now deve-loped a heart murmur.
sentences.cn: 医生说詹姆斯的心脏有杂音。

sentences.en: their warmth and hospitality is right from the heart.
sentences.cn: 他们的热情好客是发自内心的。

sentences.en: This inspiring service gave us new heart.
sentences.cn: 这项激励人心的工作给了我们新的勇气。

sentences.en: This is an excellent time for affairs of the heart.
sentences.cn: 这是谈情说爱的绝佳时机。

sentences.en: When John was 17, he died of congenital heart disease.
sentences.cn: 约翰17岁时死于先天性心脏病。

sentences.en: You're a nice girl, Lettie, and your kind heart does you credit.
sentences.cn: 你是个好女孩儿，莱蒂，你的善良值得称赞。

words.tran_cn: 鼓舞人心的，令人振奋的
衷心的；丰盛的；健壮的；精神饱满的

phrases.tran_cn: 合自己心意，称自己的心；与自己有相同爱好
伤心， 绝望， 心碎

phrases.phrase: close (或 dear) to (或 near) one's heart

phrases.tran_cn: 充血性心力衰竭，郁血性心脏衰竭
发自内心的（地）；诚心诚意的（地）
有一颗仁厚的心，有一颗金子般的心

phrases.phrase: have one's heart in one's mouth
have one's heart in the right place
have the heart to do something

phrases.tran_cn: 丧失信心，失去信心；丧失勇气

trans.tran_cn: 心，内心，心肠，爱情，核心，中心，菜心，心形，红桃牌
trans.tran_en: the organ in your chest which pumps blood through your body
